neighborhood_overview: East Boston is one of the most intriguing neighborhoods around downtown Boston. Established in the 1800's by Irish, Jewish, and Italian immigrants, it lost some of its early charm but then about a decade ago, began experiencing a revival. Now it's one of the hottest emerging neighborhoods in Boston.  President John F. Kennedy's Irish forefathers got their start in East Boston:  "President Kennedy addressing the people of New Ross, Ireland, June 1963: — 'When my great grandfather left here to become a cooper in East Boston, he carried nothing with him except two things: a strong religious faith and a strong desire for liberty. I am glad to say that all of his great grandchildren have valued that inheritance.' The Kennedy Family lived on Meridian Street in what is now a small home wedged between a Hispanic market and hardware store, approaching the Meridian Street branch of the Boston Public Library. The family later moved to a larger home on Monmouth Street. P. J. Kennedy's success enab

name: Quiet Harborside Home
summary: Comfortable quiet home in East Boston's Jeffries Point. 10-minute walk from Maverick Square T stop, 3-minute walk to Piers Point Park and the Boston city skyline! K.O. Pies and Downeast Cider are just a few blocks away. Tennis courts, basketball court, playgrounds, parks, and even sailing lessons are all within a 2 minute walk! Will and I would love to have you!
space: Jeffries Point is a quiet, safe neighborhood with a lot of families. The harbor and Piers Point Park and wonderful spots to relax and enjoy gorgeous views of Boston. Our apartment is on the top floor, (two sets of stairs up) and was fully re-finished about a year ago.  "Eastie" is a great home base for Boston explorers; Maverick Square T stop is just one stop away from Aquarium -  the closest T stop to Faneuil Hall, the North End, Old North Church, and of course the Boston Aquarium which is also the departure point for Boston  Harbor Cruises. If the subway's not for you, Lyft/Uber/Tunnel Taxi and BHC Water Taxi are other great options. The apartment is very close to Logan airport - Will and I usually walk to the terminals! The roads do not connect directly, so Eastie neighborhood traffic is not impacted. Only rarely (once or twice a week) do we hear planes overhead; East Boston is not under the flight path for departures. Best of both worlds for the frequent traveler... Will and I won'

neighborhood_overview: NA
notes: Our air mattress is queen-sized and we also have a couch that is pretty comfy.
transit: We're a 10-minute walk from the Maverick T (subway) stop, which is one stop from downtown Boston.  If the weather's nice, we also recommend taking the local water taxi across the Harbor to downtown.  It's an activity in itself! All street parking in the neighborhood is free: two-hour on-street parking is also available in front of our house, with overnight parking for guests available at the park one block away.  If you're driving & arriving late, we can provide more tips on finding parking nearby.
access: A small study, not shown in our pictures, will be locked during your stay.  Everything shown -- a large kitchen, living room, bedroom, and bathroom -- are all yours.
interaction: We'll be out of town but very available by phone.  Neighbors will be nearby if needed.
house_rules: NA
host_about:
Will and I love living in East Boston. We met in New Haven four and a half years ago while I was in graduate school, and after I graduated we moved back to Massachusetts where I used to live (in Boston) and Will grew up (in Williamstown). I work in solar development, and Will manages the international team for a mobile remittances start-up. It's great to be back and living in a new neighborhood!

We love taking runs (it's how we met), camping out, trying new recipes, and exploring this wonderful city!

name: Modern Boston Gem with Private Rooftop Deck
summary: Brand new, modern townhome steps from Logan Airport and the Blue Line train.  Perfect for vacationers to Historic Boston and business travelers looking for a more luxurious hotel alternative!  10 minute WALK to airport, 7 minute walk to Maverick Square, one stop from downtown Boston.  Three decks to choose from, including a private rooftop deck with amazing views.  Luxury eat-in kitchen with Jenn-Air appliances.  Smart TV, WiFi!  What are you waiting for?  A must see!

name: 1 Bedroom Apartment in Boston, MA
summary: This apartment brings a "homey" and cosy feeling as soon as you step in. This apartment is located in East Boston. There is a sofa bed and a double bed, which allows 4 people to stay. The apartment is a 5 minute walk from the train station. The train has quick transportation (10 minutes) to Downtown Boston. The airport is located about 2 miles from this apartment, you can take the train which takes about 5 minutes or a 5 minute drive. There's also on street parking.  We hope you enjoy your stay.

summary: Fist floor Apart. 1 step at front door to get in. (Blu line) 7 min ride to Downtown Boston. 5 min to the airport. Walking distance to stores, restaurants, bars, pharmacy and parks, gym, steps away. conformable beds. space: My home is beautiful, charming and cozy.  It has been completely renovated from top to bottom. 16ft ceilings through the apartment. There are 2 bedrooms, each bedroom has a loft space that adds another room to the bedroom. Bedroom #1 is a master bedroom suitable for handicap or people with difficult mobility. It has a Queen size bed on ground level of the bedroom a Fulton it also has its on  spacious bathroom with farm door.(30" opening ) with safety bars,  tub is 1 ft height  from the floor making easy to get in, big bathroom sink, amazing wood work designed. There is a loft bed with a King size bed with a memory foam, ceiling Height 3'7" super comfortable. It feels like an entire new room up there. Bedroom #2 has incredible wood work. a Full size bed (sleeps two comfortably) on ground level Big windows natural wood walls, on loft you have a queen size bed in one side with smart TV and cable. notes: No parties allowed. I live in the building with my husband and children. My place is great if you are on vacation with friends and family, traveling for work or just missed a flight and need a place to stay the night. It's safe.  It's home. I have been here for 15 years.
transit: Street parking only.  Take the public transportation if you don't need a car.  The train is great.
access: Entire apartment
interaction: I try to meet every guest when they get here  if my schedule permits.
house_rules: Please no smoking what's so ever in my home. Im extremely allergic to it. No parties, events, no one other than people on the booking should stay. Take your shoes off while inside of te home we have New Hardwood floors.  Please turn bathroom fan ON when taking a shower. Keep all windows closed at all times you will avoid street noise . We also have central AC/Heat want to meet cold/hot air inside.  always have thermostat on AUTO.   Keep noise down after 10pm. I have other people living on the building. Please be respectful. This is my home all I have is here and I'm trusting you to take good care of it.  My family and I wish you enjoy every moment.
host_about:
(Website hidden by Airbnb) am  an entrepreneur and a Professional artist.  I live in the building with my husband and children. We have been here for over 15 years. We love everything that Boston has to offer.  Every unit in our building  is our personal home and we are happy to share with you. We move around in between the units as we rent them. Just let me know where you would like to stay.
        My family and I love meeting new people and  having people over our  home. It gives us joy to make you feel special. Before you come in to our home we will make sure that everything looks just about perfect for you.  We always try to meet you in person if our schedule permits , so we can  welcome you with a big smile.  and make you feel like Home!
         My husband and I  travel on regular basis for work, we know what it feels like to be a guest at someone's  home... So when you are a guest in our home, we will do our best for  you to  have the time of your life!

*****
    We have civilian security cameras in common areas and front doors of the building for everyone's protection. 
We speak English, Spanish and Portuguese.
  *******
Absolutely no parties or events  allowed. This is my personal home. I live in the building with family .  This is a family home and we want to keep it this way. Looking forward in having you  along with your friends and family to enjoy Boston and our Peaceful home.

name: Five Bedroom Modern Boston Apartment
summary: Family friendly Boston apartment with an fresh modern feel.
space: 10 Minutes from Boston Airport and walking distance to waterfront and MBTA.
description: Family friendly Boston apartment with an fresh modern feel. 10 Minutes from Boston Airport and walking distance to waterfront and MBTA. Hello, this is the second floor unit to a multifamily house.  There is the first floor with a kitchen, bathroom, and three bedroom, then a second floor with two bedrooms. I may or may not be around.  I travel for work and may be in the second unit of the multifamily.  If I'm around, I'll be helpful and try to help with places to go and things to see. This is East Boston and has a Spanish/Brazilian charm.  There are very good Brazilian restaurants near by.  I am within 5 minutes walking distance to a major grocery store (Shaws, and Marshalls) as well as 10 minutes away from a great harborside lunch and dinner spot with outdoor seating (Reel House). I am within 10 minutes from the blue line at "airport" as well as 12 minutes from the blue line stop at "maverick."  Another great way to travel into downtown Boston is by using the water taxi, which is about
neighborhood_overview: This is East Boston and has a Spanish/Brazilian charm.  There are very good Brazilian restaurants near by.  I am within 5 minutes walking distance to a major grocery store (Shaws, and Marshalls) as well as 10 minutes away from a great harborside lunch and dinner spot with outdoor seating (Reel House).
notes: NA
transit: I am within 10 minutes from the blue line at "airport" as well as 12 minutes from the blue line stop at "maverick."  Another great way to travel into downtown Boston is by using the water taxi, which is about 12 minutes away walking distance.  The blue line subway station takes you to the Aquarium and Beacon Hill areas in Boston.  The water taxi takes you to the Aquarium as well.  The "Aquarium" stop is near Faneuil Hall, the Financial District, and close by Haymarket Square and Little Italy. UBER into Boston in 15 minutes. Parking on street is free for 2 hours, then only for East Boston Residents Free parking on nearby Condor Street

name: SIMPLICITY IN THE CITY Near Airport & DownTown!
summary: Within a 10 minute walking distance are delicious and award-winning restaurants, complimentary airport shuttles, subway stations, necessities like grocery stores and pharmacies, and a beautiful park right across the street. Get to Downtown Boston in 1 T stop. Despite the closeness, city noise is minimal and the apartment is not in the flight path.
space: Guests enjoy this is a lovely and well-kept apartment in a sought after and safe suburb of Boston. This listing  is for a private room with a private entrance. The windows offer views of the cityscape and abundant natural light. Guests will have the apartment mostly to themselves as there is only one other resident, a cat, and a corgi.
description: Within a 10 minute walking distance are delicious and award-winning restaurants, complimentary airport shuttles, subway stations, necessities like grocery stores and pharmacies, and a beautiful park right across the street. Get to Downtown Boston in 1 T stop. Despite the closeness, city noise is minimal and the apartment is not in the flight path. Guests enjoy this is a lovely and well-kept apartment in a sought after and safe suburb of Boston. This listing  is for a private room with a private entrance. The windows offer views of the cityscape and abundant natural light. Guests will have the apartment mostly to themselves as there is only one other resident, a cat, and a corgi. - Dishwasher - Laundry ($3 per load) - Easy parking (ask me) - Delegated pantry space - Shared kitchen  - Shared living room - Shared bathroom Amenities: - Continental breakfast (coffee, tea, and oatmeal) - WiFi - AC unit in the living room (not central AC) - High powered fan  - Toiletries (shampoo, conditioner
neighborhood_overview: Great one-of-a-kind restaurants within walking distance! I am happy to share some favorites with you. Must-haves (i.e. grocery stores, pharmacies, etcetera) less than 10 minute walk away. We are close to the water--a must-see, especially at night!
notes: Please note: There are a small corgi dog and a cat that reside in this apartment. They are very friendly and well-behaved but if you are allergic or dislike animals, this will not be the best fit for you.
transit: The Blue Line is approximately 5 minutes away (walking). Waiting on a Lyft or Uber never takes more than 3 minutes for pick-up in this area. Walking is also an option as everything you need is within a 10 minute radius.
access: - Dishwasher - Laundry ($3 per load) - Easy parking (ask me) - Delegated pantry space - Shared kitchen  - Shared living room - Shared bathroom Amenities: - Continental breakfast (coffee, tea, and oatmeal) - WiFi - AC unit in the living room (not central AC) - High powered fan  - Toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, and soap if forgotten at home) - Personal space heater for the colder months
interaction: A welcome guide will be available for the duration of your stay. I try to make myself available to give you a tour of the apartment; however, the welcome guide includes everything you would need to know. However, if you do have questions, I am always reachable via phone. I am also happy to make restaurant recommendations and the like!
house_rules: No shoes in the apartment No parties Quiet hours begin at 10pm and at all hours in the lobby
host_about:
Welcome to Boston! I love traveling too so please do not hesitate to tell me what I can do to make your vacation even better. 

Thank you for considering my listing; by doing so you are helping me achieve my dream of living in Boston on my own.

I am an avid food-lover, dog-cuddler, and photographer. In the summer especially, I am not home much except to clean. Boston is a wonderful, social city and I love to spend time out and about with my friends and my dog. However, I will absolutely make time to show you around or answer questions or suggest entertainment options. Please! Ask me!

name: H-kingdom | Smart Home | Cozy renovated
summary: Welcome to H-kingdom! If you are in Boston for a vacation, business or just a short layover, you've found the perfect place to call your base. Perfect for couples too! • 2018 renovated home - Mid century style & Smart home  • All of the essentials are provided, plus free drinks and snacks for all our guests. • Nearby subway will take you into the heart of Boston in 15 mins! • Free assigned visitor parking • Wifi & Cable TV & Chromcast are ready • Easy access to airport • Laundry in unit
space: This spacious private room is a fantastic space for your stay in Boston. Comfortably sleeps two with a luxurious, brand-new full size bed & lots of special design touches. As you arrive, your room will be waiting for you - after being professionally cleaned. You'll be welcomed with a complimentary gift basket with snacks and drinks, so you can relax and feel right at home. All of the common areas are available for your enjoyment. The living room and breakfast bar provide a great place to relax after a day of exploring Boston, connect with the host that may be staying at the same time, or just read a book on a couch. Our kitchen is available to all of our guests with complimentary coffee, tea, other drinks and snacks. This room is on the 1st floor. Please note that you're renting a single private bedroom within a 2 bed 2 bath apartment. And also, if this is your first time using Airbnb, you can use this link to receive $40 off your stay: http://www.airbnb.com/c/hanqingl22
description: Welcome to H-kingdom! If you are in Boston for a vacation, business or just a short layover, you've found the perfect place to call your base. Perfect for couples too! • 2018 renovated home - Mid century style & Smart home  • All of the essentials are provided, plus free drinks and snacks for all our guests. • Nearby subway will take you into the heart of Boston in 15 mins! • Free assigned visitor parking • Wifi & Cable TV & Chromcast are ready • Easy access to airport • Laundry in unit This spacious private room is a fantastic space for your stay in Boston. Comfortably sleeps two with a luxurious, brand-new full size bed & lots of special design touches. As you arrive, your room will be waiting for you - after being professionally cleaned. You'll be welcomed with a complimentary gift basket with snacks and drinks, so you can relax and feel right at home. All of the common areas are available for your enjoyment. The living room and breakfast bar provide a great place to relax after a d
neighborhood_overview: It's hard to find a better neighborhood in Boston. Check out what Airbnb says about East Boston here: https://www.airbnb.com/locations/boston/east-boston You are about a 1 minute walk from the subway station, Suffolk down, which is just 3 stops away from Airport or 6 stops away from Downtown Boston. Lots of delicious, inexpensive places to eat in the neighborhood.
notes: Flying into to Boston early in the morning or leaving late in the evening? As a courtesy, you can drop off your luggage in our common area before you check-in or leave it there until the evening after check-out. This way, you can enjoy the city without having to worry about luggage. Please note that it will be in the public view and we're not liable for it.
transit: - Public transportation: MBTA Blue lane Suffolk down station is a minute away.  - Visitor parking: Assigned visitor parking spot is available right after entering Park Place Condominium. - Restaurants: Plenty of cafe and fine dinings at Orient height station (1 stop from suffolk downs) within 10 mins walk.
access: Fast Wi-Fi(100 mbps) available, so you can catch up with friends or on work at any time. A fully featured kitchen is available at your disposal. Great opportunity to relax, have a snack or meet other guests. Nespresso coffee machine with unlimited gourmet coffee. Complimentary tea selection is also available. Great way to start your morning! Access to the fridge, with free snacks and drinks provided. Private shelf space is offered. Guest bathroom is stocked with all bath essentials, such as towels, toothbrushes, toothpaste, shampoo, body wash, mouthwash, hair dryer... Comfortable living room area with games and books for your enjoyment. Relax on the couch after a day of exploring the city. Everything is brand-new, modern and very comfortable.
interaction: I am happy to point people in the right direction and to share drink & snacks in the living room. In general, I get up early and return late during the week. However, I am just a phone call away and always happy to help, offer advice, or assist with whatever will make your stay more comfortable. Please don't hesitate to reach out at any time!

name: Private room, 5 mins to Airport & Train Station
summary: Cozy private room with a twin bed in recently renovated East Boston apartment. 5-min walk from Airport T stop, with subway service to downtown and shuttles to Logan. Less than 10-min walk from supermarket and area restaurants. Shared bathroom, kitchen, and common area. Fresh towels and sheets provided. Complimentary washer/dryer also available. Check-in time is 5pm on weekdays, and 12pm on Saturday/Sunday (please inquire if a different time is needed, as we can accommodate some requests).

To get to the Logan airport shuttle from here, take the walkway to the other side of the station and enter one of the blue buses. These leave every few minutes, even in the early morning or late at night. To get downtown, take the blue line train towards Bowdoin or Government Center. This train leaves from the platform closest to the apartment.

name: 2 Bedroom Apt in Maverick Square Easy to Downtown
summary: Great location in a quiet neighborhood: Just 4 minutes walk to Maverick Square MBTA subway station and restaurants, and from there it's just ONE subway stop to the heart of Boston - Faneuil Hall, Quincy Market, Italian food at the North End. Out of the apartment, Greenway Park jogging trails is ONE block away, Piers Park is a 5 min walk and offers one of the best views of downtown Boston. Newly renovated apartment offers sleeps for up to 8, with full kitchen and in unit laundry, and more...
space: A spacious master bedroom with a queen bed and another bedroom also with a queen bed. When you travel with extra friends, a full size sofa bed in the living area allows the whole party to stay together comfortably. Note that quoted rate is based on double occupancy per bed. Should you prefer single occupancy per bed, please request extra bed setup upon booking. There will be a $30/day extra bed fee. Complete kitchen for your home away from home experience, with a gas stove and oven, a microwave, toaster, and refrigerator. If you like to explore local tastes, Maverick Square is just a few minutes walk away with many restaurants, bakeries and coffee shops. For those with higher standards, Quincy Market has many food stands and shopping opportunities, and the famous Little Italy of Boston’s North End is just a few steps away from Quincy Market.

notes: Boston is a great place for partying, but not in this apartment. Please do not book this place to host a party or event. You will be asked to leave immediately.
transit: Two hour parking is Monday to Friday,  8am to 6pm. It should be easy to find on Everett Street if you don’t arrive too late at night. Pay attention to street cleaning schedule though. Your car will be towed on street cleaning day. Outside of this time frame (M-F, 8-6) you should be able to park there for free. You will need to park in a garage if you need longer parking. The easiest way to get around here is by public transportation, on foot or cab. The Maverick subway station is just about 5 minutes away!
access: Guests can use the complete apartment. Laundry facility in basement is also available upon requests.
interaction: I would love to interact with guests
house_rules: - Be considerate to guests both upstairs and downstairs - keep quiet after 10:00pm.  - Respect the great work of our cleaning staff. Place muddy web shoes in boot tray outside of room. No street shoes in the apartment. - Do not use towel to clean make up, wipe shoes and other stuffs not intended. Do not take towels with you, even if you like these quality towels. $50/set for damaged or missing towels. - Do not flush paper towel, feminine pads, tampons, diapers, wipes in toilet, unless you enjoy dealing with clogged drain.
host_about: I am the mother of two wonderful children, in love with the charming Charles River, and I have a passion for building genuine friendships with people around the world.

name: East Boston - Jeffries Point  Entire Guest Suite
summary: We are located on Boston Harbor with easy access to the airport and downtown Boston. Private  2 room suite with private bath and private entrance. Quiet neighborhood with very little traffic.  Parking available on site.
space: The suite is separated from the main home by locked double doors.  Two large adjoining rooms with private bathroom.  You control the AC. Mini fridge.  Keurig. Wireless internet.
description: We are located on Boston Harbor with easy access to the airport and downtown Boston. Private  2 room suite with private bath and private entrance. Quiet neighborhood with very little traffic.  Parking available on site. The suite is separated from the main home by locked double doors.  Two large adjoining rooms with private bathroom.  You control the AC. Mini fridge.  Keurig. Wireless internet. Your suite is private with private access. We are a great resource for restaurants, entertainment and sightseeing if you need us! We are located in beautiful Jeffries Point neighborhood on Boston Harbor facing Downtown Boston. Beautiful walking path along the harbor leads to Piers Park where you can rent a hubway bike to ride the East Boston Greenway path. Local Marina 2 minutes away including ICA Museum , KO Pies australian restaurant and Downeast Cider brewery. Easy access to public transportation. 7 minute walk to the T and then only one stop to the Boston waterfront at the Aquarium, Fanueil

Beautiful walking path along the harbor leads to Piers Park where you can rent a hubway bike to ride the East Boston Greenway path. Local Marina 2 minutes away including ICA Museum , KO Pies australian restaurant and Downeast Cider brewery.
notes: Although the suite is pet free we do have 2 cats in the main home so if your seriously allergic you may want to reconsider.
transit: Easy access to public transportation. 7 minute walk to the T and then only one stop to the Boston waterfront at the Aquarium, Fanueil hall, and the North End. 2 stops to downtown/financial district, 3 to Government Center/TD Garden.  We are literally 5 minutes to/from the airport.  Waterfront taxi down the street for a quick trip to Seaport or Innovation District.

name: Stunning Waterfront 1 stop away from downtown!
summary: Centrally and conveniently located, brand new luxury condominium with a stunning waterfront view awaits your upcoming Boston holiday!  Comfortably sleeps up to 3 adults. 5-10 minute walking distance to airport, public transit to downtown (1 stop away from North End/Faneuil Hall), water taxi, and local attractions (art museum, cider brewery, restaurants, & more!) Explore the neighborhood's panoramic water views, parks, walking/running trails, and both local and critically-acclaimed eateries.
space: - Walking distance to and from airport (no need for calling a cab or Uber!) - One stop away from one of the most frequently visited places in the world (Faneuil Hall) - 1/2 mile away (0.96 km) from public transportation (Maverick T Station) - 5 minute walk from: Piers Park (best view of Boston skyline), Blue Bikes Boston, local Cider Brewery,  Australian fare, fresh fruit and veggie bodegas, Food network featured pizzeria, etc. - Safe, idyllic neighborhood suitable for families

host_about:
Hello nomads, travel enthusiasts, and adventurers!

I’ve resided in the amazing city of Boston for eight years and am originally from Southern California. I know the city like the back of my hand, and would be more than happy to answer any questions you may have, and share my  recommendations for making the most of your Boston visit!

In my free time I love traveling, immersing myself in different cultures, going to music events, working out, and cooking healthy & delicious foods.

name: Beautiful/Modern East Boston Home Away from Home
summary: Thank you for considering my East Boston home!  Easy access from my Eagle Hill location to local restaurants, bars, beautiful parks, as well as stunning waterfront views of the Seaport and Boston skylines. It is a commuters dream - short walk to Blue Line T station, minutes to downtown Boston and Logan Airport via car, or T. Easy access to downtown Boston as well, including historic Faneuil Hall, North End restaurants, and the famous aquarium.
space: This condo is a beautiful, spacious and modern 3 bedroom/2 bath condo in hot and trendy Eagle Hill featuring high ceilings, marble bathrooms, professional chef eat-in kitchen with designer quartz counter-tops, subway back-splash, high-end LG stainless steel appliances and elegant modern shaker cabinets. It shows off a sun-filled master bedroom with bay windows and spacious mirror closet. New central A/C and heating system, washer and dryer in the unit. Gut renovated unit, new electrical and plumbing, new rubber roof and windows, gleaming hardwood floors.  High speed WiFi is available to all guests, as well as a TV with Amazon Firestick attached to enjoy Netflix, Hulu, etc.

neighborhood_overview: Enjoy diverse restaurants and bars as you walk down through Eagle Hill and explore Maverick Square, and Jeffries Point! One of the better rated brunch/cafe spots, Angela’s cafe, is located one block from my home. Feel free to ask about some of my other favorite places to go!
notes: There is 2 hour street parking available. I also have a list of convenient, reasonably priced parking lots within a 10 minutes drive of my home that I can provide!
transit: There are two accessible blue line T stops. Orient station is an 8-10 minute walk, and Maverick station is a 13-15 minute walk.
access: The entire second floor is yours to enjoy!
interaction: I will typically not be on premises, but am always available via text, email, or messaging through the air bnb app
house_rules: The three units in my building all work together to create a respectful environment to live in. Please be courteous of the neighbors on the first and third floors. There are quiet hours after 10 pm in our building.
host_about: Born and raised in the Boston area! Love this city and hoping you will too.

name: Springtime in Boston!  Adorable 1BR Condominium.
summary: No better time to visit Boston than in late winter and spring!  Enjoy 1 bedroom condo all to yourself.  Freedom & independence - come and go as you please.  Easy check in/check out.  Quiet.  Comfortable.   Great location close to subway and all that Boston offers. Easy walk to Maverick Square and one stop on T you are in Boston proper.  10 minute walk to Airport T to pick up buses to all terminals...or a couple bucks for an Uber. Vibrant  neighborhood.  Close to so much that Boston offers.
space: Easy to access 1 BR unit above street level.  Bright and cheerful space - very pleasant to relax in.  Air conditioned and heated.  Wifi and TV included with Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime movies.
description: No better time to visit Boston than in late winter and spring!  Enjoy 1 bedroom condo all to yourself.  Freedom & independence - come and go as you please.  Easy check in/check out. Close to so much that Boston offers. Easy to access 1 BR unit above street level.  Bright and cheerful space - very pleasant to relax in.  Air conditioned and heated.  Wifi and TV included with Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime movies. Entire unit to yourself.  Access via key pads.  Come and go at you please. Guests have access to the unit without my greeting them.  I am available for support if needed -  always available via text/phone.  Complete independence. Vibrant and quickly developing harbor side neighborhood.  Convenient to everyt
neighborhood_overview: Vibrant and quickly developing harbor side neighborhood.  Convenient to everything!  Eastie is to Boston what Brooklyn NY is to Manhattan (except we don't have the cool Brooklyn Bridge...but we do have the views!).  Every amenity you can think of is in walking distance to unit:  Shaw's grocery store, CVS/Walgreens, Marshalls, fast food, slow food (Italian, Latino, Vietnamese, Pizza, Fine Dining).  One subway stop and you are at the Boston Aquarium, Financial District, Faneuil Hall Marketplace, Boston Harbor Boat Tours, Whale Watches and more.  You won't be disappointed.
notes: Come,  relax,  enjoy Boston! Guests have had 3rd person sleep on comfy sofa (not sofa bed).  Full size air bed also available in bedroom closet to inflate if desired.
transit: Two subway stops are nearby on the Blue line:  Maverick (4 minute walk from unit) and Airport (10 minute walk from unit).  Uber/Lyft available 24/7.  Water Taxi available to bop around Boston Harbor at nearby Eddy (5 minute walk from building), take to any of 26 stops along the Harbor.  Easy access to tunnels going every direction out from the city!
access: Entire unit to yourself.  Access via key pads.  Come and go at you please.
interaction: Guests have access to the unit without my greeting them.  I am available for support if needed -  always available via text/phone.  Complete independence.
house_rules: - Residential building, please be respectful.
host_about:
Easy going, professional guy living in Boston, MA.  Own a condo in East Boston that is close to everything.  Have family across the US that I travel to and visit with.  GLBT friendly here.  Into family, friends, working out, job, theater, movies, and church.

Five things I can't live without:  friends, healthy food, computer, almond butter, HP

Some favorite movies: Swiss Army Man, The Fault In Our Stars, The Matrix, Elf, Erin Brokovitch, Call Me By Your Name, Star Trek, Maurice, + more...

Newer to Airbnb.  Enjoying hosting a lot!  I'm neat, clean cut, organized, and low maintenance.

description: Launchpad to Boston's Brooklyn. Bohème one-bedroom penthouse, sleeps 2 comfortably (can sleep 4 - comfy air mattress), steps from the Airport subway station or a 5-min drive from your arrival gate, 10 min to the Aquarium, trolley tours, Boston's Italian North End, TD Garden, Legal Seafoods, and Boston's kid-friendliest park system Rose Kennedy Greenway. Coffee, bagged-snacks, private fridge, 2 HDTVs, and an Airbnb Guide to Boston restaurants, bars, and site-seeing provided. The apartment is located at the top of 4 flights of stairs. No elevator. Flooded with natural light from sunrise to sunset when black-out curtains are open. AC in summer. The bed and the air mattress are queen size. No smoking. A blender, microwave, electric stove and range, toaster, fridge/freezer, dishwasher, Bose stereo, Alexa, and Nespresso machine provided. Guests have access to Hulu, Amazon Prime Video, Netflix, and HBO. Host will meet guests by request, based on need and availability. Host provides curated Ai
neighborhood_overview: East Boston, while quickly gentrifying around the edges, is an extremely safe, storied, and multi-ethnic neighborhood across the harbor from Boston and accessible by subway, car, and bus. The oldest public gym in America is a block away, alongside some of the best (and least-touristy) Italian and Latin restaurants in the city, and arguably the least-crowded, largest, and best-maintained public park system in all of Boston. East Boston is also home to the Institute for Contemporary Art's newest museum (ICA Watershed), Down East Cider brewery, Constitution Beach, multiple water-taxi terminals, and 2 of the best sunset-views in Boston (both restaurants with outdoor seating).
notes: 2 fire extinguishers, carbon-monoxide detector, and full first-aid kit included.
transit: Maverick T (subway) stop is a 2 minute walk and will get you downtown in 6 minutes, where you can change lines to be in any neighborhood in the city within 15 minutes. Ubers are always available such a short distance from the airport.
access: A blender, microwave, electric stove and range, toaster, fridge/freezer, dishwasher, Bose stereo, Alexa, and Nespresso machine provided. Guests have access to Hulu, Amazon Prime Video, Netflix, and HBO.
interaction: Host will meet guests by request, based on need and availability. Host provides curated Airbnb Guide detailing best restaurants and bars by price and reputation and best tourist attractions.
house_rules: - Food and drink not designated for guests is off-limits. - Quiet after midnight. - No shoes worn in the apartment. - No roof access. (You will be the last guest, and that would be a bummer!) - No rearranging magnets or other decoration. - Thermostat should not be set above 75. - Large cast iron and non-stick pans should be kept in drawer under stove when not in use. - Cast iron should be washed in warm water with a soft sponge and soap. - No sharp knives in dishwasher. - Run garbage disposal or water purifier with cold water, only. - Bikes are not for use unless specifically requested and allowed.
host_about: I build Customer Experience for a living, working with startups to keep their customers happy and returning. In another life, I was a Peace Corps volunteer. Pleased to meet creative, curious people from around the world.

name: *MODERN & CONVENIENT* Master Suite
summary: Welcome! Our newly renovated condo offers guests a super convenient location that is great for tourists, couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and anyone else that needs to be close to the airport! This beautiful master suite comes with a private bath and Smart TV so you can indulge in Netflix after exploring the city. - 8 minutes driving from downtown Boston - 7 minutes driving from Logan Airport -5 minute walk to Airport Blue Line subway T-Stop which is just 2 stops to downtown!
space: You’ll love this vibrant and sunny bedroom in the contemporary condo! The condo features brand new kitchen cabinets, countertops, and appliances as well as a hotel quality mattress, 700 GSM Turkish cotton towels, and super soft 1000 thread count sheets. You'll also find a Keurig and coffee and tea selection to make your mornings more enjoyable. The most convenient and affordable location in Boston! Please note that you are renting a private suite within a three bedroom condo. All the guests will be using the common areas. They will also be Airbnb  guests, so maybe you will become new exploring buddies in the city or exchange stories about your day.  You will have a key for your bedroom and the door can be locked at any time you choose.

access: You will have this private 1 bedroom all to yourself which includes a full bathroom. The common spaces (living room and kitchen area) are shared spaces. You are free to leave your luggage on  both checkin and checkout days (Please note that they will be shared spaces so we are not liable for it, however).

name: Private Queen Bedroom in Maverick Square
summary: Master bedroom in newly renovated 2 bedroom 1st floor apartment. Beautiful queen bed. Close to Maverick Square MBTA subway station, with easy access to both downtown Boston and Logan Airport. The North End & Quincy Market are just ONE subway stop away on the MBTA Blue Line, and offer a variety of shopping and dining options. Piers Park is a 5 min walk from the apartment and offers one of the best views of downtown Boston.
space: A spacious master bedroom with a queen bed. Complete kitchen for your home away from home experience, with a gas stove and oven, a microwave, toaster, and refrigerator. If you like to explore local tastes, Maverick Square is just a few minutes walk away with many restaurants, bakeries and coffee shops. For those with higher standards, Quincy Market has many food stands and shopping opportunities, and the famous Little Italy of Boston’s North End is just a few steps away from Quincy Market.

access: You will have this private 1 bedroom all to yourself. The common spaces (living room, kitchen area, and bathroom) are shared spaces.  We have Wi-Fi available so you can easily keep in touch with family and friends. If you are arriving early or departing late, as a courtesy you are able to drop your luggage in the common area of the condo. The suite typically wont be ready until 4pm for checkin and checkout is at 11am. You are free to leave your luggage on  both checkin and checkout days (Please note that they will be shared spaces so we are not liable for it, however).
interaction: I am not around the condo much due to other commitments but I'm quick to respond to messages and am always just a phone call away in case of emergencies!
house_rules: - Quiet time is from 10pm to 7am. - No shoes in the house, please. - Lost key fee of $25. If you would like to check in on a major holiday (Thanksgiving, Christmas Day, New Years Day, or Independence Day) please send us a message.

name: Spacious Eastie Duplex-Groups, Airport & Corporate
summary: Clean & beautifully designed Duplex located on a Main Street in East Boston. SUPERB for flight-attendants as it is a short 10 minute walk to Airport Station, or a 5 minute Uber ride to the Airport. PERFECT for Family or Corporate get-togethers. This bright and spacious 2-story space was designed to ensure you are provided everything you need to call it your home away from home. We hope you'll love your stay and all of the accommodations, necessities, and conveniences we have tried to ensure.
space: This apartment is a ~1,300 sqft Duplex (2nd and 3rd Floor of a 3 Story building), which has 2 spacious bedrooms and 2 Full-Bathrooms. Comfortably Sleeps 10-12 guests! 3 Queen Beds, 1 Queen Self-Inflating Bed, and 2 Full Sofa Beds. So close to city's Financial and theater district, The North End, The Seaport, Boston Commons, Fenway Park, Logan Airport - everything in Boston is within a 5-15min Uber Ride away!  Enjoy Beautiful Bremen Street Park (with a Kid's Playground), East Boston YMCA right behind the property for an early morning Jog/gym workout, or enjoy a Bike Ride through the City Bike station just right behind the property! The space offers you all of the luxuries we have at home;  spacious living, comfortable and practical seating,  2 full bathrooms,  stainless steel appliances,  washer + dryer, Nespresso Essenza Machine (How to use: (Website hidden by Airbnb)  65" Smart TV,  Xfinity 150mbps Internet,  Streaming Services (Netflix, Amazon Prime, all included).  Perfect for: Stud

neighborhood_overview: We are 1 Block from locally Famous restaurants; Santarpio's Pizza, Oliveira's Brazilian Steakhouse, and Spinelli's Pasta & Pastry Shop!  East Boston is a commuters dream because its affordable, diverse, and just minutes away from downtown Boston! The Neighborhood is culturally diverse - Hispanic, Brazilian and Italian cultures are most prevalent so you'll always have the opportunity to try something new and theres plenty of restaurants within walking distance if you want a local experience. You can certainly and very quickly leave the area with an Uber ride or train ride to the North End for Italian cravings, South Boston/Seaport/Fenway for a younger scene, or the Copley/Back Bay/South End for noteworthy Newbury Street and the Art + Design District.
notes: NA
transit: The Property is located on a main street in East Boston (aka Eastie). Directly behind the house there is a YMCA, the East Boston Public Library, a very large and beautiful 18 acre public park (Bremen Street Park) with a Bike Station, and just minutes away from Logan Airpot Blue Line Train Station.  If you want to travel into the City without a car - simply take a quick walk to Airport Station (Blue Line) located behind the property and through the Bremen Street Park and from there you will have options to go into State Street which is in the Financial District of Boston and in walking distance to the North End, Quincy Market, Boston Common, and Downtown Boston. Boston is a small city so you can easily enjoy it walking around - especially during the spring and summer months. During the winter months I'd strongly suggest utilizing taxis, Ubers, and the MBTA to avoid high-traffic congestion times (early morning commuters and around 5pm). If driving - you are 2 minutes away from the Underw
access: NA
interaction: It's my first hosting property - Everything is brand-new, modern and very comfortable. I hope I have given you enough to call it home during your stay in Boston!!! Let me know if there is anything you need and I will do my best to meet your needs.  Most of the times, you won't see me at the space due to other commitments. I offer self check-in and self check-out for your convenience. However, I am just a phone call, text away and am always happy to help, offer advice, or assist with whatever will make your stay more comfortable. Please don't hesitate to reach out at any time!
house_rules: - Quiet Hours after 10pm - This apartment has STRICT NO SMOKING ANYTHING POLICY and NO HOUSE PARTY POLICY.  - Check in from 3 pm - 11 pm - Please treat my property like your own home - PLEASE be mindful and avoid jumping, skipping steps, dancing, and slamming the entrance doors. - Please do not park in the Drive-Way as it belongs to the state elderly care housing property next door. Street Parking is available in the Visitor Parking Spaces. - I will greet you or will have a lock box at the Front Entrance - please return keys to Lock Box or leave Keys in Unit upon Check-Out. - Please always lock the Front Entrance Door. - Please do not purchase movies on the streaming services without permission. - Please do not use space heaters or other electronic heating equipment - during the winter months please keep the thermostat between 65-70 Degrees. Air Conditioning Units will be installed during the Summer Months. - Trash Days are on Thursdays - If this is during your stay, please take the tr
host_about:
I am focused on real estate, modern design and architecture. I look to share experiences, insight, and have good conversations with enthusiastic and ambitious people, and to inspire those I come across. 
I look forward to the personal and business conversations, experiences and opportunities brought on through Airbnb hosting or as an Airbnb guest during my travels.

name: East Boston - Private apt & perfect subway access
summary: Live / Stay In Boston, like a real Bostonian. Comfortable and cozy entire two bedroom flat with private entrance and a great value.   **New listing: see reviews of owner's other properties! Located a short 7-9 minute walk from the subway system this is a great option to obtain the easy access to Boston you desire with the right value built in. Or call an Uber for a short 5 minute drive into downtown.
space: While the entire first floor is yours to enjoy, there will be other people coming and going from the building. Please respect the quiet hours and the comfort of others in the building.
description: Live / Stay In Boston, like a real Bostonian. Comfortable and cozy entire two bedroom flat with private entrance and a great value.   **New listing: see reviews of owner's other properties! Located a short 7-9 minute walk from the subway system this is a great option to obtain the easy access to Boston you desire with the right value built in. Or call an Uber for a short 5 minute drive into downtown. While the entire first floor is yours to enjoy, there will be other people coming and going from the building. Please respect the quiet hours and the comfort of others in the building. Guests can access the common hallway to get to the flat. The first floor is all yours to enjoy. There is also laundry (washer & dryer) in the basement (free to use, and please supply your own detergent, available within a one block walk) To access and for directions please contact Ross I try to meet all of my guests by stopping by during your stay, or if convenient being the one who checks you in. Once you'v
neighborhood_overview: East Boston, or "Eastie" as it's called by locals, has experienced it's first few strong years of gentrification. While the neighborhood has some character it's safely located across the street from a public school. Eastie is changing fast, and for the better. Come stay here now; try out and tell your friends about the mom and pop places you enjoyed in the neighborhood.
notes: I've used my furnishings to set up this Airbnb. It's a great place to be based for a Boston trip, but some reviews I've received are based on an expectation of a 5-star hotel. This Airbnb offers a great value with short travel times into the heart of the city, but it is not a luxury flat; true Airbnb'ers will love it! If you have question about the flat before or after you book please reach out and I will happily answer them. East Boston has a lot of character, and I encourage guests to explore the area around the flat as well as downtown Boston, which is less than 15 minutes away by subway and less than 5 minutes away by car.
transit: As Eastie may not be the reason you're visiting Boston, this location offers easy access to the more touristy neighborhoods of Boston. PARKING: Also the flat does not include a private driveway. In the evening and weekends, or for two hour periods of time, you can park on the street. Make sure to obey the posted signs.  For garage parking the closest lot I'm aware of is the economy airport parking lot. It's about $20/day, and about a 10 minute walk (walk to and through the airport subway stop using the stairs) or short Uber/can ride from the flat. Cheers, Ross
access: Guests can access the common hallway to get to the flat. The first floor is all yours to enjoy. There is also laundry (washer & dryer) in the basement (free to use, and please supply your own detergent, available within a one block walk) To access and for directions please contact Ross
interaction: I try to meet all of my guests by stopping by during your stay, or if convenient being the one who checks you in. Once you've arrived please don't hesitate to request a great location, event, restaurant, etc. I love this city and this flat offers great access to multiple transportation options to access downtown.
house_rules: - Quiet hours start at 9:30pm - There is a zero tolerance for smoking in the flat or on the deck.  Please kindly abstain from smoking while at the flat or a fine of your $200 deposit will be applied.  We never like to penalize, but the odor of smoke ruins the experience for the next guest. - From November - March do not set the heat above 69°.  This rule is to keep the cost of the unit economical for guests.  If you would like to set the heat higher this can be arranged with Ross for a nominal fee.  If this rule is broken after a reminder a fee from your deposit will be added to your bill.
host_about:
I'm a professional in Boston, and have recently been getting into real estate.  It's been a fun adventure, and I've enjoyed hosting with airbnb.  I love this city, and love that I can share it with people who stay at my places.  Be careful though, if you ask me what you should check out in Boston, it will take a lifetime to complete.

When I'm not talking up my city, you'll find me runing on the river, sailing on the ocean, or hosting another party on my deck with friends.

Best,

Ross

notes: NA
transit: The house is located roughly about 100meters/yards to the Airport train station. You may walk there to take the shuttle to your terminal or the blue line train to Downtown (Inbound train). Parking is very standard for Boston and is actually more lenient or available than other Boston neighborhoods. All the signs in front of the house read "Free 2 hour parking (Monday-Friday 8am-6pm)" however people including myself leave their cars there all day and I have never been ticketed. After business hours, parking signs are not in effect and you may park anywhere. I never have any difficulty finding parking near the house. The most you will have to do is drive around the block.

name: Comfy Room-Close to Downtown Boston & airport
summary: Welcome! If you are visiting Boston for work, play or just on short layover, this is the perfect place for you to stay.
space: • Memory Foam Mattress to rest after a long day of travel or sightseeing! • Great for couples and solo travelers. • 3 minute walk to a nearby subway will take you to the heart of Boston in less then 15 minutes! • Affordable, great price for central location! • USB charging outlets, no need to worry about bringing adapters/ converters to charge your mobile phones. • All of the amenities provided, plus free drinks and snacks for all our guests. • Light blocking blinds, so you can sleep in darkness! • Front door and room doors all have electronic keypad locks. Secure and no keys to fuss with!  • Easy access to airport - 14 minute walk to the airport shuttle or 1 subway stop away. • Room air conditioner installed to keep cool during the summer and a portable space heater if you like it extra toasty during winter.

Recently renovated, modern home with tons of sunlight. This
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is a mix of young working professionals and families that have lived in the neighborhood their entire lives. Folks are friendly and the street is well lit & quiet at night. About a 7 minute walk away is a square where you can get Pizza, Peruvian, Mexican, Colombian, and Italian food.
notes: Flying into to Boston early in the morning or leaving late in the evening? As a courtesy, you can drop off your luggage in our living room alcove before checking in or leave it there until the evening after check-out. This way, you can enjoy the city without having to worry about luggage. Please note that it will be in the public view and we're not liable for it, however.
transit: The house is walking distance from Logan airport and very accessible by T. In 15 minutes, you could be in downtown Boston!
access: Recently renovated, modern home with tons of sunlight. This room is on the 2nd  floor. Please note that you're renting a single private bedroom within a single family home. There are a few private bedrooms in the house - most of which are used by other Airbnb guests, so you'll be in good company. Our kitchen is available to all of our guests with complimentary coffee, tea, other drinks and snacks. Stock up at the nearby market across the street and use the kitchen to prepare a breakfast or lunch before you head out the door.
interaction: Most of the times, you won't see us at the space due to other commitments. We offer 24 hour self check-in and self check-out for your convenience. However, we're both just a phone call away and are always happy to help, offer advice, or assist with whatever will make your stay more comfortable. Please don't hesitate to reach out at any time!

host_about:

name: Special and Breathtaking East Boston studio
summary: NA
space: The studio is the entire lower level of my home. The entire house was gutted and upgraded with modern appliances and finishes in 2010. The studio unit has a full bath with a soaking tub , a private deck, ceiling fan with remote , small refrigerator and a large walk in closet.
description: The studio is the entire lower level of my home. The entire house was gutted and upgraded with modern appliances and finishes in 2010. The studio unit has a full bath with a soaking tub , a private deck, ceiling fan with remote , small refrigerator and a large walk in closet. Guests have private access to the entire lower level of the house. There is also a private deck outside the studio with patio furniture. In the winter, when the leaves are down, there are views of the City. I work during the day , but am available in the evening to answer any questions. My studio is located in the Orient Heights neighborhood of East Boston. Both Orient Heights and Suffolk Downs MBTA Blue Line Stations are within a 5 minute walk. Free Parking is available on Orient Avenue, which is one block away up the hill. There is parking on the street outside my house, but it requires an East Boston  neighborhood sticker. The City doesn’t ticket often, but I can’t in good conscience assure you that they won’t

name: Spacious room- Minutes to downtown & airport #1
summary: Welcome! If you are visiting Boston for work, play or just on short layover, this is the perfect place for you to stay.
space: More information • Memory Foam Mattress to rest after a long day of travel or sightseeing! • Great for couples and solo travelers. • 3 minute walk to a nearby subway will take you to the heart of Boston in less then 15 minutes! • Affordable, great price for central location! • USB charging outlets, no need to worry about bringing adapters/ converters to charge your mobile phones. • All of the amenities provided, plus free drinks and snacks for all our guests. • Light blocking blinds, so you can sleep in darkness! • Front door and room doors all have electronic keypad locks. Secure and no keys to fuss with!  • Easy access to airport - 14 minute walk to the airport shuttle or 1 subway stop away. • Room air conditioner installed to keep cool during the summer and a portable space heater if you like it extra toasty during winter. Recently renovated,  modern home with tons of sunlight. This room is on the 1st floor. Please note that you're renting a single private bedroom within a single fa
description: Welcome! If you are visiting Boston for work, play or just on short layover, this is the perfect place for you to stay. More information • Memory Foam Mattress to rest after a long day of travel or sightseeing! • Great for couples and solo travelers. • 3 minute walk to a nearby subway will take you to the heart of Boston in less then 15 minutes! • Affordable, great price for central location! • USB charging outlets, no need to worry about bringing adapters/ converters to charge your mobile phones. • All of the amenities provided, plus free drinks and snacks for all our guests. • Light blocking blinds, so you can sleep in darkness! • Front door and room doors all have electronic keypad locks. Secure and no keys to fuss with!  • Easy access to airport - 14 minute walk to the airport shuttle or 1 subway stop away. • Room air conditioner installed to keep cool during the summer and a portable space heater if you like it extra toasty during winter. Recently renovated,  modern home with tons
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is a mix of young working professionals and families that have lived in the neighborhood their entire lives. Folks are friendly and the street is well lit & quiet at night.  About a 7 minute walk away is a square where you can get Pizza, Peruvian, Mexican, Colombian, and Italian food.
notes: Flying into to Boston early in the morning or leaving late in the evening? As a courtesy, you can drop off your luggage in our living room alcove before checking in or leave it there until the evening after check-out. This way, you can enjoy the city without having to worry about luggage. Please note that it will be in the public view and we're not liable for it, however.
transit: From the airport : #1. You could take the blue subway line from the airport station 1 stop to wood island station and then its a 3 minute walk to the airbnb. OR #2. Take the free silver line shuttle to the airport subway station. From there its a 14 min walk (.7 miles) to the  airbnb. If you are arriving by car, there is free overnight parking 1.5 blocks away from 6pm-8 am 7 days a week, then it becomes 2 hour parking after that. If you will be staying a few days, there is a paid parking lot you can leave your car at across from the Wood Island Subway stop. It's a $5 daily rate, cash only. The lot is self service so have the correct amount ready.
access: Fast Wi-Fi available, so you can stay connected while traveling A fully featured kitchen is available at your disposal. Great opportunity to relax, have a snack or meet other guests. Keurig K-Cup coffee machine with unlimited gourmet coffee. Complimentary tea selection is also available. Great way to start your morning! Access to the fridge, with free snacks and drinks provided. Private shelf space offered for each room.
interaction: Most of the times, you won't see us at the space due to other commitments. We offer 24 hour self check-in and self check-out for your convenience. However, we're both just a phone call away and are always happy to help, offer advice, or assist with whatever will make your stay more comfortable. Please don't hesitate to reach out at any time!

neighborhood_overview: East Boston is an up and coming Boston Neighborhood. Rich in culture and a beautiful view of Boston. There are many bike paths and amazing cuisine in a five mile radius of the apartment. We are also close to many stores, plaza, park and grocery stores for your convenience. We also are a 4 min drive/10 minute walk from the maverick T station. The T has access to downtown Boston, Back Bay, Cambridge, Revere Beach and many more locations.
notes: This space contains a lovely, homey feel. We provide complementary tea and coffee. Guests are welcome to use back. Our house very close proximity to several convenience stores, supermarkets, restaurants and liquor stores for your convenience.
transit: Street parking. The city is fairly bike friendly and we have a garage you may store it in upon request. We are also close so many modes of public transportation. The apartment is very convenient to: -Maverick T Station - 4 min drive/ 11 min walk -Logan airport - 5 min drive - Bus - 150 ft walk - Liberty shopping plaza and grocery store - 4 min walk - Aquarium - 11 min drive - Quincy Market - 13 m drive - Museum of Science - 8 min drive - Museum of Fine Arts - 15 min dr - MIT - 12 min drive - Harvard Sq - 17 min drive - Copley Sq - 11 min drive - Mass General Hospital - 9 min drive - Fenway Park -  11 min drive - Downtown Boston - 10 min drive - Boston Commons - 14 min drive - Charles River Esplanade - 8 min drive - ATM/Bank - 2 min walk - Bike / Hubway St - 4 min walk  - Library - 5 min walk  - Revere Beach - 14 min drive
access: we have code number available to your leisure and convenience so when you arrive you have immediate access to the place! When we get closer to the date I will send you a code number, the entrance is blue door in front of the house. To open the door put the code and turn the latch to right and please don’t forget push down the handle  and do the same when you leave the room.
interaction: Call, email or text us! We are open to communication with our guests! We also offer the “Local” Boston Tour when available.
house_rules: Please feel free to use anything in the place  No Party  and   No event  No smoking in side  No loud music Please... keep the place clean. Keep the dishes/sink clean after each use, really great appreciate  Turn off all lights when not in use We are as GREEN as possible to help the environment :-) Please don’t forget lock the door went you go out.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in an up and coming neighborhood of Boston. East Boston also known as "Eastie", is located in between the airport and Downtown.
notes: NA
transit: The house is located roughly about 100meters/yards to the Airport train station. You may walk there to take the shuttle to your terminal or the blue line train to Downtown (Inbound train). Parking is very standard for Boston and is actually more lenient or available than other Boston neighborhoods. All the signs in front of the house read "Free 2 hour parking (Monday-Friday 8am-6pm)" however people including myself leave their cars there all day and I have never been ticketed. After business hours, parking signs are not in effect and you may park anywhere. I never have any difficulty finding parking near the house. The most you will have to do is drive around the block.

Located near many restaurants/bars, waterfront. The building is very secure and safe. The neighbors are quiet and the neighborhood is peaceful. The best part of the place is it location. neighborhood_overview: East Boston, or as the locals call it "Eastie" is one of the City's hottest and fastest-growing neighborhoods.  East Boston features a unique mix of great restaurants, arts and cultural amenities, outdoor activities, and outstanding views of the ocean and Boston skyline. Location, Location, Location. Not only does Boston East offer the best views of the Harbor and Boston skyline, it's conveniently located on the MBTA Blue Line, just minutes from downtown Boston.
notes: **PARKING** There is free on-street parking in our neighborhood! You can park a car right in front of the place from 6 pm - 8 am on weekdays and all day/night on weekends. It is 2 hour parking only from 8 am - 6 pm during the weekdays.  ***There is private parking right behind the apartment for only one car that can be accessed from the back yard, it is only $25 per day.
transit: ***ONLY a 5 minute walk to Airport Train/Bus Station (Blue Line)*** **Train Service from Airport Station** 2 stops to North End (4 min)  3 stops to Downtown (6 min) **Bus Service from Airport Station**  Shuttle service to  Logan Airport Terminals Take SL3 Bus to Seaport District (Next Stop)  PARKING: There is parking right behind the apartment for only one car that can be accessed from the back yard, it is $25 per day.
access: The entire apartment will be to yourself, which is accessed simply via key pads, come and go as you please. Guests can use all the amenities including full kitchen and laundry. Free Wi-Fi can be accessed from anywhere in the place. There is a set of hi-efficiency washer and dryer for your group's exclusive use.  There will also be free coffee and tea for you to enjoy!  Please make use of the large outdoor space if you are going to smoke, absolutely no smoking inside.  Please respect my house as I have created a very clean and comfortable environment for you and yours to enjoy during your stay!
interaction: Please do not hesitate to message or call for any questions or concerns!
house_rules: Please be professional and respectful of the property.  Prefer no shoes in house, in order to keep the apartment as clean as possible.
host_about:
Thank you so much for visiting my property! I take pride in maintaining every aspect of my rentals. As you can see I want to make sure my guests have the upmost positive experience possible. I am outgoing and try to accommodate every guest on a personal and professional level. The key to a successful business is knowing your clientele. I work hard to do so and believe you will appreciate the effort I put in to make you feel at home.

I have been married for 35 years, and have 3 kids, 2 girls, and 1 boy. I am a family oriented person who is meticulous and responsive. When you stay as a guest with me if you ever need anything, I am always available to help you. I started from the bottom and worked my way up so I know the value of hard work. We want you to feel like you're at home when you stay with us. I promise you that you will use my location again and again! My wife and I have experience with renting and real estate as an investor so we know what it takes to please guests.

name: Romantic Gate away on  a roof
summary: My cozy condo is tucked between the roofs in historic East Boston.  Everything is brand new and dedicated to giving you authentic and relaxing travel experience.  Breakfast items, the 24-hours self-check-in and close proximity - only 5 min walk to the metro station, makes my place the most convenient and cool place around. I hope to welcome you and provide you with a wonderful relaxing stay!
space: Beautiful, renovated,  modern 2 bedroom/1 bath condo in trendy Eagle Hill. Walk out to a huge roof top deck with Tobin Bridge and city views. Condo features lovely high ceilings, marble bathroom, professional chef eat-in with an open-concept kitchen, designer quartz counter-tops, huge kitchen island, subway back-splash, high-end LG stainless steel appliances and elegant modern shaker cabinets. Tons of storage spaces. Central A/C, heating system, washer and dryer in the unit.  We just finished fully renovation of an amazing comfortable and magic space in premier location, near Logan Airport, downtown Boston, Boston Medical Center which is a central public park in downtown Boston, SoWa Open Market. Not too far from Fenway Park, TD Garden for all Red Sox, Celtics and Bruins games etc.

neighborhood_overview: Our apartment located in a heart of East Boston,  hot and trendy historic district known as Eagle Hill. Most of its housing stock dates from the late 19th century, and that stock is a mix of single-, two- and three-family homes. Moreover, those single-families can be quite sizable by Boston standards and quite historic to boot. Thus a big reason the feds added Eagle Hill to the National Register of Historic Places in 1998; and also likely a big reason new development is rare, if not nonexistent.
notes: Free street parking during weekends, 2 hours week day. Long term parking in airport lots.
transit: We are 1.8 miles from Logan International Airport. 0.7 mile / 7 minutes walk to the Maverick station which will bring you to downtown Boston in 5 min

name: ★ Tiny & Cozy Room | Walking to Airport + Subway ★
summary: Welcome! Tiny cozy room with a full size bed, walking distance to the Airport and just 2 stops on the Metro to Downtown.  PLEASE NOTE: • Set of stairs leading to house and room • One shared bathroom and a half bath • Poor noise isolation in room • Self check-in and self check-out for your convenience via a smart lock • 6 minute walk to the blue line subway • Easy access to the  I90 & I93 Highway • Restaurants, bars, Shaw's (groceries), 24/7 CVS and Walgreens within 5 min walking distance
space: Recently renovated, gorgeous modern house with a great open layout. This room is on the 2nd floor and requires you to go up a flight of stairs. Please note that you're renting a single private bedroom within a larger house. There are several private bedrooms in the house - most of which are used by other Airbnb guests, so you'll be in good company. The living room provides a great place to relax after a day of exploring the area, connect with other guests that may be staying at the same time, watch a bit of American TV or just read a book on the couch. Our kitchen is available to all of our guests with complimentary coffee and tea. There is a Shaw's supermarket just 5 min walking where you can purchase groceries and use the kitchen to prepare a breakfast or lunch before you head out the door. There are 1.5 bathrooms in the house and you can use either one, as you prefer. If this is your first booking on Airbnb? Use this link to receive $40 off your stay: www.airbnb.com/r/ijm

An old Italian neighborhood of Boston with the current demographic consisting of Italian and Latin Americans primarily from Central and South America.
notes: NA
transit: Great Boston Location conveniently located near the Airport and Downtown Boston. Just a 6 minute walk to the subway Airport T station. This is a perfect location for someone getting in from the airport. You can take the airport shuttle to the last stop, which the Airport T station and walk from there to the house and get back the same way. All of the maps are attached in the pictures for your reference.
access: Fast Wi-Fi available, so you can catch up with friends or on work at any time. A fully featured shared kitchen is available at your disposal. Great opportunity to relax, have a snack or meet other guests. Complimentary tea and coffee selection is also available. Great way to start your morning! Small fenced in back yard with a back porch accessible through the sliding glass door in the kitchen. To get out to the back porch make sure to remove the stick in between the screen doors that is propping it shut.  When locking the screen door back place the stick back into place One and half shared bathrooms are available in the apartment. Comfortable living room area with games and books for your enjoyment. Relax on the couch after a day of exploring the city. Everything is recently renovated, modern and very comfortable.
interaction: NA
house_rules: - Quiet hours from 10pm to 8am - Keep the common areas tidy after use
host_about: I am from Boston, and love to travel and meet new people and learn about new cultures.  I would describe myself as very easy going and open minded. I have been to many places around the world and used airbnb for many of my stays. It was such a great experience meeting different people from different countries and cultures who open up their doors to you and are so warm and welcoming, that I got inspired to do it myself.  Hope I can be as gracious of a host as many airbnb'ers were to me and make your stay here in Boston very relaxing and  enjoyable!

name: Humble/small sub-level “Sleep E-Z” 5min to Airport
summary: $300 for a hotel? Ha! Things to know: Sure the photos are lovely, but that’s because I’m a photographer. The space was outdated when recently bought, then revamped with my own two hands everyday after work for a month (no I’m not a carpenter or handyman, but YouTube is a pool knowledge). The fact the place was outdated, in need of a facelift AND a sub-Level Unit; the word “SPEAKEASY” was the 1st thing that came to mind. You’ll find it very humble with a feel of rustic DIY "Feng shui". Namasté
space: This is the probably one of few listings you’ll find in Boston offering the feel and look of a hidden sub-level bar/speakeasy that has all the trimmings including a 4-in-1 mini pool table / fooseball, table tennis, air hockey & dart board. Look closely at the photos, if a sub-level unit isn’t your thing you may want to search elsewhere.  Things to know:  I burn incense twice a day during my studies, so there is a 95% chance you will smell it when staying at Sleep E-Z. Feel free to burn my incense as well if you’re into that :) but if not, this might not be the best option for you.

neighborhood_overview: East Boston is a diverse residential area known for waterfront spaces like LoPresti and Piers parks, both overlooking the harbor, and sandy Constitution Beach. Hip Boston Harbor Shipyard is home to the ICA Watershed, a summer-only contemporary art gallery, plus outdoor sculptures and a cidery. A laid-back dining scene encompasses pizza and pasta spots, plus traditional Central and South American restaurants.
notes: If I am out of town and fuse boxes need to be accessed or water valves need to be turned on or off for whatever reason (this has never been an issue...yet), I have a superintendent within walking distance who can further assist. PARKING:  -Alternate side street parking for all 7am-5pm (2 hour max for non east Boston residents). -East Boston resident only parking 5pm-7am  **I’ve never seen these regulations enforced but I will say park at your own risk if you’re overnighting without a resident parking sticker.
transit: Street parking available and lots of public transportation available within walking distance
access: You’re access will include the entire condo which is the only unit on its floor.
interaction: I’m usually just a phone call or text away. Can be there to address anything in person if needed but provide crystal clear instructions along with house rules.
house_rules: No shoes on the carpet or in bedroom please
host_about: Creativity drives my activity. I own a camera and a speakeasy-like condo. Images are like music. It contains love and memories. I’m also pretty ok with my hands.

name: ★Luxurious Master, Instaworthy Design★
summary: Hello! Our new industrial chic condo offers guests a super convenient location that is great for tourists, couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and anyone else that needs to be close to the airport! This beautiful master suite comes with a private bath and Smart TV so you can indulge in Netflix after exploring the city. - 10 minutes driving from downtown Boston - 7 minutes driving from Logan Airport -8 minute walk to Wood Island Blue Line subway T-Stop, just 3 stops to downtown!
space: You’ll love this vibrant and spacious private suite! The condo features brand new kitchen cabinets, countertops, and appliances as well as a hotel quality mattress, 700 GSM Turkish cotton towels, and super soft 1000 thread count sheets. You'll also find a Keurig and coffee and tea selection to make your mornings more enjoyable. The most convenient and affordable location in Boston!  Please note that you are renting a private master room within a three bedroom condo. The designated bathroom is next to the bedroom door (not attached) but designated to this rooms use only. All the guests will be using the common areas. They will also be Airbnb  guests, so maybe you will become new exploring buddies in the city or exchange stories about your day.  You will have a key for your bedroom and the door can be locked at any time you choose.
